p:
After culturing the embryos, calluses were appeared after 8–10 days. The callus induction was determined as following formula:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{Callus}\ \mathrm{induction}=\frac{\mathrm{Number}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{calluses}\ }{\mathrm{Total}\ \mathrm{number}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{zygotic}\ \mathrm{embryos}}\times 100 $$\end{document}
Callus induction =
Number of calluses
Total number of zygotic embryos
× 100
